Package io.github.JeremyBloom.mosdex2

Class MsdxInputSource

java.lang.Object
java.io.InputStream
io.github.JeremyBloom.mosdex2.MsdxInputSource
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable
public class MsdxInputSource
extends java.io.InputStream
Provides a standard source for reading a MOSDEX JSON File. Static factories are provided with different signatures for different types of input: stream, file, path to file, URL, or resource. The constructors and static factories set up the input source. The MOSDEX Object Factory creates a JSON parser from the Input Source and uses it in the Factory's read methods to create the MOSDEX Object Model from the JSON.
Author:
Dr. Jeremy A. Bloom (jeremyblmca@gmail.com) Â©2019 Jeremy A. Bloom
